name: Yet another platformer (Jin9310)
description:
Yet another platformer is a platform game where you try to survive incoming platforms while not getting out of the screen.

Controls:

- arrow keys/AWD

- Left Shift for dashing

You can collect yellow circles for double jump, which is just a temporary "buff". You can see if you have still have it in your top-left corner of the screen.

This is not an endless thing, there is ending, although please do not expect anything fenomenal at the end. I had really limited amount of time and I had just about 2-3hrs per day for this, so I kept it really simple as I wasn' t sure how much I can pull off at the end. This is why the game lacks basically any graphics and it contains just few coloured circles and rectangles, but despite that I hope that the experience will be some-what challenging and CHAOTIC.

Enjoy the chaos, leave a feedback or a comment if you feel like it, enjoy your day and thank you so much for your time, with my game.

Jin

The game has been created during Brackeys Game Jam with a theme: "Let there be chaos". Tools used:

- Unity

- FL Studio

- Audacity

- Photoshop

- Pen & Paper

- Github
